pkgmetadata.longdescription:
The goal of the Clang project is to create a new C, C++, Objective C and Objective C++ front-end for the LLVM compiler.
Features and Goals
Some of the goals for the project include the following:
End-User Features: Fast compiles and low memory use Expressive diagnostics GCC compatibility Utility and Applications:
Modular library based architecture Support diverse clients (refactoring, static analysis, code generation, etc) Allow tight integration with IDEs Use the LLVM BSD License Internal Design and Implementation:
A real-world, production quality compiler A simple and hackable code base A single unified parser for C, Objective C, C++, and Objective C++ Conformance with C/C++/ObjC and their variants
